title: What makes them float?
text: At first I thought there was some magnetic force pushing the upwards, but after harvesting a small piece I see they are full of copper, which isn't magnetic.
Second thought was some kind of reversed gravity, but it didnt move when I carried on harvesting. They should have raised higher when they became lighter.
Third though was that something trapped in them was making them float, but after harvesting a full one I can see that's not the case.
I am stumped as to what makes them float.
